document_name: Annual Project Report National and Local Integrity Systems
Project Fact Sheet National and Local Integrity Systems

outputs.output_descr: Introducing and sustaining effective solutions to addressing integrity/corruption risks at local level, with particular focus on fostering meaningful civic engagement and partnerships across different parts of society. Capacity building of the State Commission for Prevention of Corruption for monitoring the integrity systems.

project_descr: Introducing effective solutions for addressing integrity/corruption risks, with particular focus on fostering meaningful civic engagement
